title: Dataproc - Dataproc Granular IAM
abstract:
# Dataproc - Dataproc Granular IAM
Dataproc Granular IAM 是一項功能，該功能允許您在集羣、作業、操作、工作流模板或自動擴縮政策級層授予權限。
示例：您可以向一位用戶授予集羣“查看者”角色，該角色允許用戶查看項目中的集羣，並向另一位用戶授予作業“修改者”角色，該角色允許用戶更新，取消和查看作業。 請參閱 [Granular IAM 啓用的 SDK 命令](#sdk_commands_enabled_by_granular_iam) 以瞭解每個 Dataproc Granular IAM 角色啓用的特定 Google Cloud CLI 命令。
Dataproc Granular IAM 更新 **現有** Dataproc 資源的權限。例如，您不能用它來設置正在創建的集羣或正在提交的作業的權限。
content:
## Dataproc Granular IAM 角色和權限
Dataproc Granular IAM 可以設置具備以下 Dataproc 資源權限的以下角色。
### 集羣角色
| 角色 | 權限                                                        |
|:-------|:----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| 查看者 | dataproc.clusters.get                                                    |
| Editor | dataproc.clusters.get dataproc.clusters.list dataproc.clusters.delete dataproc.clusters.update dataproc.clusters.use dataproc.clusters.start dataproc.clusters.stop                |
| Owner | dataproc.clusters.get dataproc.clusters.list dataproc.clusters.delete dataproc.clusters.update dataproc.clusters.use dataproc.clusters.start dataproc.clusters.stop dataproc.clusters.setIamPolicy dataproc.clusters.getIamPolicy |
### 作業角色
| 角色 | 權限                                 |
|:-------|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Viewer | dataproc.jobs.get                              |
| Editor | dataproc.jobs.get dataproc.jobs.cancel dataproc.jobs.delete dataproc.jobs.update              |
| Owner | dataproc.jobs.get dataproc.jobs.cancel dataproc.jobs.delete dataproc.jobs.update dataproc.jobs.setIamPolicy dataproc.jobs.getIamPolicy |
### 操作角色
| 角色 | 權限                                  |
|:-------|:------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| 查看者 | dataproc.operations.get                             |
| Editor | dataproc.jobs.get dataproc.operations.cancel dataproc.operations.delete                 |
| Owner | dataproc.jobs.get dataproc.operations.cancel dataproc.operations.delete dataproc.operations.setIamPolicy dataproc.operations.getIamPolicy |
### 工作流模板角色
| 角色 | 權限                                            |
|:-------|:-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Viewer | dataproc.workflowTemplates.get                                      |
| Editor | dataproc.workflowTemplates.get dataproc.workflowTemplates.delete dataproc.workflowTemplates.update                     |
| Owner | dataproc.workflowTemplates.get dataproc.workflowTemplates.delete dataproc.workflowTemplates.update dataproc.workflowTemplates.setIamPolicy dataproc.workflowTemplates.getIamPolicy |
### 自動擴縮政策角色
| 角色 | 權限                                                       |
|:-------|:------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| 查看者 | dataproc.autoscalingPolicies.get                                                |
| Editor | dataproc.autoscalingPolicies.get dataproc.autoscalingPolicies.use dataproc.autoscalingPolicies.delete dataproc.autoscalingPolicies.update                      |
| Owner | dataproc.autoscalingPolicies.get dataproc.autoscalingPolicies.use dataproc.autoscalingPolicies.delete dataproc.autoscalingPolicies.update dataproc.autoscalingPolicies.setIamPolicy dataproc.autoscalingPolicies.getIamPolicy |
## 使用 Dataproc Granular IAM
本節介紹如何在現有 Dataproc 資源上使用 Dataproc Granular IAM 爲用戶分配角色。有關更新和移除 Identity and Access Management (IAM) 角色的更多常規信息，請參閱 [授予、更改和撤消訪問權限](https://cloud.google.com/iam/docs/granting-changing-revoking-access?hl=zh-cn) 。
**IAM 術語** 。以下是基本的 IAM 術語。理解這些術語可以幫助您理解本節中示例的結構和效果。- **資源** 項目、集羣、作業、操作、工作流模板或自動擴縮政策
- **政策** 資源上的綁定集合（每個資源一個政策）
- **綁定** 一系列主賬號（用戶、組或服務賬號）到一個角色的映射
- **角色** 權限集合
- 獲取資源的 IAM [政策](https://cloud.google.com/dataproc/docs/reference/rest/v1/Policy?hl=zh-cn) ，並將其寫入 JSON 文件（可以是“clusters”、“jobs”、“operations”或“workflow-templates”或“autoscaling-policies”）：```
gcloud dataproc resource-type get-iam-policy resource-id \
    --region=region \
    --format=json > iam.json
```
- JSON 文件的內容將如下所示：```
{
 "bindings": [ {
  "role": "roles/editor",
  "members": [  "user:mike@example.com",
  "group:admins@example.com",
  "domain:google.com",
  "serviceAccount:my-other-app@appspot.gserviceaccount.com"
  ]
 }
 ],
 "etag": "string"
}
```
- 使用文本編輯器將新的 [綁定對象](https://cloud.google.com/dataproc/docs/reference/rest/v1/Policy?hl=zh-cn#Binding) 添加到綁定數組中，該數組定義了用戶以及這些用戶的資源訪問角色。例如，如需向用戶`sean@example.com`授予 Viewer 角色 (`roles/viewer`)，您需要更改上面的示例以添加新的綁定對象（以下面的 **粗體** 顯示）。注意：請確保返回您在`gcloud dataproc` `` `get-iam-policy`中收到的`etag`值（請參閱 [etag 文檔](https://cloud.google.com/dataproc/docs/reference/rest/v1/Policy?hl=zh-cn#FIELDS.etag) ）。```
{
 "bindings": [ {
  "role": "roles/editor",
  "members": [  "user:mike@example.com",
  "group:admins@example.com",
  "domain:google.com",
  "serviceAccount:my-other-app@appspot.gserviceaccount.com"
  ]
 },
 {
  "role": "roles/viewer",
  "members": [  "user:sean@example.com"
  ]
 }
 ],
 "etag": "value-from-get-iam-policy"
}
```
- 運行以下命令（可以是“clusters”“jobs”“operations”“workflow-templates”或“automated-policies”），以新的綁定數組更新集羣的政策：```
gcloud dataproc resource-type set-iam-policy resource-name \
    --region=region \
    --format=json iam.json
```
- 該命令會輸出更新後的政策：```
{
 "bindings": [ {
  "role": "roles/editor",
  "members": [  "user:mike@example.com",
  "group:admins@example.com",
  "domain:google.com",
  "serviceAccount:my-other-app@appspot.gserviceaccount.com"
  ]
 },
 {
  "role": "roles/viewer",
  "members": [  "user:sean@example.com"
  ]
 }
 ],
 "etag": "string"
}
```
- 發出getIamPolicy 請求以獲取資源的 IAM [政策](https://cloud.google.com/dataproc/docs/reference/rest/v1/Policy?hl=zh-cn) 。 **集羣 getIamPolicy 示例：** ```
GET https://dataproc.googleapis.com/v1/projects/projectName/regions/region/clusters/clusterName:getIamPolicy
```
- JSON 文件的內容將如下所示：```
{
 "bindings": [ {
  "role": "roles/editor",
  "members": [  "user:mike@example.com",
  "group:admins@example.com",
  "domain:google.com",
  "serviceAccount:my-other-app@appspot.gserviceaccount.com"
  ]
 }
 ],
 "etag": "string"
}
```
- 使用文本編輯器構建以下 JSON [政策](https://cloud.google.com/dataproc/docs/reference/rest/v1/Policy?hl=zh-cn) 對象，以包含剛剛從 Dataproc 服務收到的綁定數組。請確保返回您在 getIamPolicy 響應中收到的“etag”值（請參閱 [etag 文檔](https://cloud.google.com/dataproc/docs/reference/rest/v1/Policy?hl=zh-cn#FIELDS.etag) ）。現在，請將新的 [綁定對象](https://cloud.google.com/dataproc/docs/reference/rest/v1/Policy?hl=zh-cn#Binding) 添加到綁定數組中，該數組定義了用戶以及這些用戶的集羣訪問角色。例如，如需向用戶`sean@example.com`授予 Viewer 角色 (`roles/viewer`)，您需要更改上面的示例以添加新的綁定對象（以下面的 **粗體** 顯示）。```
{
 "policy": {
 "version": "",
 "bindings": [  {
  "role": "roles/editor",
  "members": [   "user:mike@example.com",
   "group:admins@example.com",
   "domain:google.com",
   "serviceAccount:my-other-app@appspot.gserviceaccount.com"
  ]
  },
  {
  "role": "roles/viewer",
  "members": [   "user:sean@example.com"
  ]
  }
 ],
 "etag": "value-from-getIamPolicy"
 }
}
```
- 通過發出 setIamPolicy 請求，在資源上設置經過更新的政策。 **集羣 setIamPolicy 示例：** ```
POST https://dataproc.googleapis.com/v1/projects/projectName/regions/region/clusters/clusterName:setIamPolicy
Request body
``````
{
 "policy": {
 "version": "",
 "bindings": [  {
  "role": "roles/editor",
  "members": [   "user:mike@example.com",
   "group:admins@example.com",
   "domain:google.com",
   "serviceAccount:my-other-app@appspot.gserviceaccount.com"
  ]
  },
  {
  "role": "roles/viewer",
  "members": [   "user:sean@example.com"
  ]
  }
 ],
 "etag": "value-from-getIamPolicy"
 }
}
```
- JSON 響應的內容將如下所示： **響應** ```
{
 "bindings": [ {
  "role": "roles/editor",
  "members": [  "user:mike@example.com",
  "group:admins@example.com",
  "domain:google.com",
  "serviceAccount:my-other-app@appspot.gserviceaccount.com"
  ]
 },
 {
  "role": "roles/viewer",
  "members": [  "user:sean@example.com"
  ]
 }
 ],
 "etag": "string"
}
```
轉到 Google Cloud 控制檯中的 [Dataproc 集羣](https://console.cloud.google.com/dataproc/clusters?hl=zh-cn) 頁面，然後點擊集羣名稱左側的複選框，以打開 **權限/標籤** 面板（如果該面板未顯示，請點擊頁面右上角的 **顯示信息面板** ）。 在“權限”標籤頁下，選擇 Dataproc 角色，在 **添加主賬號** 框中添加一個或多個賬號地址，然後點擊 **添加** 。
## Granular IAM 啓用的 SDK 命令
下表顯示了每個 Granular IAM 角色在 Cloud Dataproc 資源上啓用的 `gcloud dataproc` 命令。
### 集羣
| IAM 角色 | 命令                                                                                                        |
|:-----------|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Viewer  | gcloud dataproc clusters describe cluster-name                                                                                             |
| Editor  | gcloud dataproc clusters describe cluster-name gcloud dataproc clusters list gcloud dataproc clusters delete cluster-name gcloud dataproc clusters diagnose cluster-name gcloud dataproc clusters update cluster-name gcloud beta dataproc clusters start cluster-name gcloud beta dataproc clusters stop cluster-name                           |
| Owner  | gcloud dataproc clusters describe cluster-name gcloud dataproc clusters list gcloud dataproc clusters delete cluster-name gcloud dataproc clusters diagnose cluster-name gcloud dataproc clusters update cluster-name gcloud beta dataproc clusters start cluster-name gcloud beta dataproc clusters stop cluster-name gcloud dataproc clusters get-iam-policy cluster-name gcloud dataproc clusters set-iam-policy cluster-name |
### 作業
| IAM 角色 | 命令                                                                |
|:-----------|:-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Viewer  | gcloud dataproc jobs describe job-id                                                        |
| Editor  | gcloud dataproc jobs delete job-id gcloud dataproc jobs describe job-id gcloud dataproc jobs kill job-id gcloud dataproc jobs update job-id gcloud dataproc jobs wait job-id                      |
| Owner  | gcloud dataproc jobs delete job-id gcloud dataproc jobs describe job-id gcloud dataproc jobs kill job-id gcloud dataproc jobs update job-id gcloud dataproc jobs wait job-id gcloud dataproc jobs get-iam-policy job-id gcloud dataproc jobs set-iam-policy job-id |
### 操作
| IAM 角色 | 命令                                                               |
|:-----------|:-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Viewer  | gcloud dataproc operations describe operation-id                                                    |
| Editor  | gcloud dataproc operations delete operation-id gcloud dataproc operations describe operation-id gcloud dataproc operations cancel operation-id                            |
| 所有者  | gcloud dataproc operations delete operation-id gcloud dataproc operations describe operation-id gcloud dataproc operations cancel operation-id gcloud dataproc operations get-iam-policy operation-id gcloud dataproc operations set-iam-policy operation-id |
### 工作流模板
| IAM 角色 | 命令                                                                                     |
|:-----------|:-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Viewer  | gcloud dataproc workflow-templates describe template-id                                                                        |
| Editor  | gcloud dataproc workflow-templates delete template-id gcloud dataproc workflow-templates describe template-id gcloud dataproc workflow-templates remove-job template-id gcloud dataproc workflow-templates run template-id                                |
| Owner  | gcloud dataproc workflow-templates delete template-id gcloud dataproc workflow-templates describe template-id gcloud dataproc workflow-templates remove-job template-id gcloud dataproc workflow-templates run template-id gcloud dataproc workflow-templates get-iam-policy template-id gcloud dataproc workflow-templates set-iam-policy template-id |
### 自動擴縮政策
| IAM 角色 | 命令                                                                                          |
|:-----------|:----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Viewer  | gcloud dataproc autoscaling-policies describe policy-id                                                                              |
| Editor  | gcloud dataproc autoscaling-policies delete policy-id gcloud dataproc autoscaling-policies describe policy-id gcloud dataproc autoscaling-policies update policy-id gcloud dataproc clusters create cluster-name --autoscaling-policy policy-id                                |
| 所有者  | gcloud dataproc autoscaling-policies delete policy-id gcloud dataproc autoscaling-policies describe policy-id gcloud dataproc autoscaling-policies update policy-id gcloud dataproc clusters create cluster-name --autoscaling-policy policy-id gcloud dataproc autoscaling-policies get-iam-policy policy-id gcloud dataproc autoscaling-policies set-iam-policy policy-id |
## 使用 Granular IAM 提交作業
要使用 Dataproc Granular IAM 允許主賬號（用戶、羣組或服務賬號）將作業提交到指定的集羣，除了向用戶授予集羣上的 Editor 角色之外，還必須在項目級設置其他權限。要允許主賬號在指定的 Dataproc 集羣上提交作業，步驟如下：
- 創建 [Cloud Storage 存儲桶](https://cloud.google.com/storage/docs/creating-buckets?hl=zh-cn) ，您的集羣可使用該存儲分區連接到 Cloud Storage。
- [將主賬號添加到存儲桶級層政策中](https://cloud.google.com/storage/docs/access-control/iam-roles?hl=zh-cn) ，併爲該主賬號選擇 Storage Object Viewer 角色（請參閱 [roles/storage.objectViewer](https://cloud.google.com/storage/docs/access-control/iam-roles?hl=zh-cn#standard-roles) ），該角色包含以下權限：
- `storage.objects.get`
- `storage.objects.list`
- 創建集羣時，使用`--bucket`參數將您剛創建的存儲桶的名稱傳遞給集羣（請參閱 [gcloud dataproc clusters create --bucket](https://cloud.google.com/sdk/gcloud/reference/dataproc/clusters/create?hl=zh-cn) ）。
- 創建集羣后，請在集羣上設置一項政策，以向主賬號授予 Editor 或 Owner 角色（請參閱 [使用 Dataproc Granular IAM](#using_dataproc_granular_iam) ）。
- [創建 IAM 自定義角色](https://cloud.google.com/iam/docs/creating-custom-roles?hl=zh-cn#creating_a_custom_role) ，使其具備以下權限：- `dataproc.jobs.create`
- `dataproc.jobs.get`
- 在 Google Cloud 控制檯的 [IAM](https://console.cloud.google.com/iam-admin/iam/?hl=zh-cn) 頁面上選擇或添加主帳號，然後選擇自定義角色以將其應用於主帳號。
